actions.message: Hi everyone!!! Good luck
let’s find bugs
I had one game need to pause for a bug already today
Good luck and have fun! Who else is playing 1882 for the first time (I guess not Jac)
Good luck! I've played it twice on Board18, but far from an expert.
I’ve played 6 times? i’d have to check
I played a 2p game on board18 a month or so ago.
Really excited about this one
Yeah, it's a cool game.
i’m not an expert
OK, so beat up on Jac, right? :D
i’m okay with that
This game is kinda brutal
the rebellion is on 4 btw
yours for 195
i’ve never seen any start like this lol
Well, I don't have a clue how to play these companies. I did start in an asynch game 20 minutes ago, but we are still in SR1, so I have no frame of reference how it should go.
ya, I need to check, but I don’t have a great record at this game. at least 1 bankruptcy haha
Sorry - just realized I don't "have" to buy a train yet.
Still don't know if it is right, but...
i think it’s the best move
Hmm... No bump from being sold out, huh?
no room
Duh
I had the same thought
why keep shares that won’t pay?
andrew: you know about the fishing spot right? you could run a 2 train to 2 cities AND the fishing
Boy I bet Andrew is glad I bought a share :D
haha
i would have liked it
Yeah, absolutely, Jac. Will try to set up for that.
I, for one, have always believed in your company, Monty:)
lol
(Although Jac's move of selling it and then buying it back cheaper was smarter.)
I agree that it was smarter. Very different game.
I keep forgetting that I can sell after buying
Too used to Chesapeake and 46
It feels like starting a company early could be bad, but it is hard to tell...
game often ends in BK
autopass unless any sells
autopass unless sells for me
Huh, there's something weird going on with the NWR. I believe I got that move all fine, but now I'm getting issues running trains.
It looks like I should be able to run for 260, but it's only counting 80 when I hit submit.
I'll try refreshing and doing it again.
Yeah, I get a "$80" and a "Cannot run another corporation's train. Refresh." error. Anyone else want to give it a try?
sure
Awesome. Routes I had were Maidstone-Spiritwood, Fishing-Spiritwood (using the count fishing as a spot), and the 3 from Spiritwood-Prince Albert-10.
Unless the count fishing as a spot doesn't work anymore...
it works
but i’m getting 180
how do you get more than 180?
Huh. Maybe I had the count wrong. It was showing 260. 180 is fine...much better than 80!
180 is highest i could find
You’re right—i tried it in hot seat mode and it told me 260, but 60+70+50 is 180
Yeah, adding it manually, 180 seems right.
Awesome. Thanks for the help.
It definitely says “Submit $260” though
team work :)
All right, there we go. Thanks for getting it to work, Jac.
Living on the edge
Sorry, Monty, my misclick there. Thought it was on me.
No worries
i’m at share limit lol
Oh, wow. I've never seen anyone hit the cert limit because of privates before.
i’ll buy them in
You could sell a CNR and get the 5th SC, though.
nah
Just trying to be helpful ;p
lol
reminder
the NWR will happen soo
soon
so make your tiles green if you want to keep them
Indeed. Those yellow tiles are set to vanish.
Soon :D
